group_1.textRight: *Pant* *Pant*

group_1.textLeft: What in the world is going on?

group_1.textRight: Must you ask? Here...
I made you a promise, didn't I? Materials@for New Year's decorations.
With assistance from Konomi, we gathered@all we could carry.

group_1.textLeft: ...! [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]Thank you so much, both of you!

group_1.textRight: Oh, Mitama. May I spread everything out over@here?
While I brought some extra materials, I also@made some myself earlier.
See!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, wow! What an exquisite rope ornament!

group_1.textRight: Thank you! I'm very happy with how it came@out!
One of the flower shop employees and I@worked very hard on it!

group_1.textLeft: Are you sure I can have something so@wonderful for myself?

group_1.textRight: Sure! I want you to have it!
I brought red and white striped curtains.
The neighborhood association had a few left@over and luckily agreed to lend them out.
There's also materials for bamboo and@flower ornaments.

group_1.textLeft: I must say, you sure know your New Year's@decorations.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I wouldn't say that...

group_1.textLeft: Really! I stand by what I said! How did you@become so knowledgeable?

group_1.textRight: Um, well you see...
I decided to make original wreaths.
It was for Christmas this year to see how@well they'd sell at the shop.
And they were a huge hit!
So, I thought it'd be a good idea to try@making more seasonal goods.

group_1.textLeft: Which is what led you to trying your own@New Year's decorations?

group_1.textRight: Yes!
Well, everything is set up and ready. Shall@we start?
Nothing here is all that complicated to do,@so relax and take it one step at a time!

group_1.textLeft: I'll lend a hand as well.

group_1.textRight: Okay, should we start with making the flower@ornaments?
